channel.title: Hmmm i got a tricky problem... need help
channel.description: ok my client is now all edit and ready for my friends to test and give me feedback about what needs to be fixed, edit, etc. im tyring to do this without letting them have the opputurnity to edit the server/client or steal it and claim its there rsps. is there a way to let them test it without having them edit it or change anything?

item.title: Hmmm i got a tricky problem... need help

item.description:

i know… i made a new player named test and it still didnt work…

Read full topic

item.title: Hmmm i got a tricky problem... need help
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

Set the no-ip in client.java, remove all the .java files, and .bat files, and jar it. As long as your friends don’t have a decompiler, your good. (Try actually programming your server, not just editing it)

Read full topic
